results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (n>=1, 0 <= k <= n^2) = maximal number of squares not attacked by any arrangement of k queens on an n X board = n^2 - A274947(n,k).
comment: For further information see A274947, which is the main entry for this problem.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 27 2016
ext: Corrections and more terms from _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, Jul 29 2016
